description: A table to solve the long-standing issue of not looking cool enough.
Mimification allows you to change the appearance of items without modifying their behavior at all!
For most items, the appearance slot will serve as the direct appearance for the target item, the only exceptions to this are:
> Mimified Items. The target item will gain the transmogrification of the existing item, instead of its original appearance.
> Mimicatalyst. If you place one of these in the Appearance Slot, the target item will be Mimified into a hidden item.
> To remove the Mimification from an item, place it in the  Mimification table without an appearance item.
